export default {
    products: [
        {
            _id: '1',
            name: 'Full Zip Running Shirt',
            category: 'Shirt',

            price: 90,
            brand: 'Nike',

            numReviews: 10,
            countInStock: 6
        },
        {
            _id: '2',
            name: 'Running Shoe',
            category: 'Shoe',
            image: '../images/product-2.png',
            price: 120,
            brand: 'Nike',
            rating: 5,
            numReviews: 20,
            countInStock: 10
        },
        {
            _id: '3',
            name: 'Summer T-Shirt',
            category: 'T-shirt',
            image: '../images/product-3.png',
            price: 40,
            brand: 'Nike',
            rating: 4.2,
            numReviews: 30,
            countInStock: 12
        },
        {
            _id: '4',
            name: 'Down Jacket',
            category: 'Jacket',
            image: '../images/product-4.png',
            price: 260,
            brand: 'Northface',
            rating: 5,
            numReviews: 20,
            countInStock: 15
        },
        {
            _id: '5',
            name: 'Woolen Sweater',
            category: 'Sweater',
            image: '../images/product-5.png',
            price: 120,
            brand: 'Sherpa',
            rating: 4.8,
            numReviews: 30,
            countInStock: 22
        },
        {
            _id: '6',
            name: 'Blue Jeans',
            category: 'Jeans',
            image: '../images/product-6.png',
            price: 60,
            brand: 'Denim',
            rating: 4.5,
            numReviews: 12,
            countInStock: 8
        }

    ]
}
